page.title: 05 LIFE STYLES
page.content: We asked people in our block about their eating habits. More people have cereal than cooked breakfast.We think that because a lot of people have to go to work very early,they only have time for a drink and biscuit.Toast was quite popular because it's warm and doesn't take long to prepare. Most people have their main meal in the evening because a lot of people go to work.Many people have their main meal at lunch time because a lot of men work on farms near to where they live. Most people have{3 meals}a day they are probaly breakfast,lunch and tea.A few people have{4 meals}a day probably they count supper in.Nobody has more than{4 meals }a day and nobody has less than {1 meal}a day. Many people have{only {2 meals.}
